Title: Huoli Shaonian Wang 3
Description: [Huoli Shaonian Wang, ' is a Chinese multi-media franchise created to sell yoyo toys to children. ', Huoli Shaonian Wang 3, ' is the first animated season in the franchise but the 3rd story chronologically.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The show focuses on competitive schools that hold yo-yo contests. Each team has their own issues that they solve. Each yoyo has a name that reflects the toy's design. The show makes use of minor special effects in order to portray magic/spirit/chi and the speed of the yoyo. These "magic spells" are "battling" and the person whose "magic" remains, wins. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: Wiki)']
